title: California bill would require vaccines for all employees - WKRC TV Cincinnati
content: California bill would require vaccines for all employees  WKRC TV CincinnatiView Full Coverage on Google News
description: SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) — California would mandate that all businesses require their employees and independent contractors to receive the COVID-19 vaccine under legislation announced Friday by Democratic state lawmakers that was immediately criticized by Republicans as government overreach. Employees or contractors who qualify for medical or religious exemptions would have to be regularly tested under a planned amendment to the bill.
